name: How to Cook A Galaxy
description:
PITCH

In « How to Cook A Galaxy », we control a lonely alien living near a black hole. Due to his loneliness, he decides to travel around space and search for beautiful planets to steal in order to create his own galaxy.

GOAL

You control an alien that can stole special planets with a rope.
While traveling around space, find the 3 specific planets (Red Planet, One with Rings and a Blue Planet) and bring them back to your home near the black hole.

However, pay attention to the obstacles that will get in your way such as the gravity, asteroids or falling comets.

GAMEPLAY

You can use the lasso on the different planets.

CREDITS

Game Designers : David FERNAND, Antoine PINSON

Game Programmers : Mathieu PREVOT, Antoine ESBELIN

Game Artist : Gabriel KENIG

Music : "Mellow Keyboard Groove" by Steve Lowther provided by freesoundtrackmusic.com
